name: Llorando por el Mundo
description: The night I started making this, there was a lightning storm. It was reported to have more than 1000 lightning strikes in 3 hours. During the storm, I visualized a woman crying waterfall tears. It was as if all the frustration and anger that was inside of me was in that visualization. I think she is crying for everyone who has being pushing themselvesâ€”especially those of us who lived in survival mode for most of their lives. "Llorando por el Mundo" means weeping for the world.
